casebody.data:
No. 11-6173. Robert R. Heffernan, Petitioner v. Grant Harris, Deputy Director, Arkansas Department of Correction, et al. 565 U.S. 968, 132 S. Ct. 465,

181 L. Ed. 2d 303,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 7485. October 17, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 419 Fed. Appx. 706.
